title: relationship
description: Relationship represents a pattern of behavior that may be observed.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `relationship`

title.description: A name or short description used to identify the relationship.

description.description: A description that helps provide context about the relationship.

source_ref.description: The ID of the source (from) object.

target_ref.description: The ID of the target (to) object.

is_directional.description: Indicates whether the relationship is directional. For values in the standard vocabulary, this attribute may be hardcoded to a particular value.
